title: Achaemenid Empire
summary: The first Persian Empire, founded by Cyrus the Great, spanning from the Indus Valley to the Aegean Sea.

rulers.name: Cyrus the Great
rulers.description: Founder and unifier of the Persian Empire.

rulers.name: Xerxes I
rulers.description: Led the empire during the Greco-Persian wars.

title: Parthian Empire
summary: Powerful empire blending Greek and Persian traditions, famous for its cavalry warfare.
facts: Defeated Romans at the Battle of Carrhae.

rulers.name: Orodes II
rulers.description: Victor of the Battle of Carrhae.

title: Sasanian Empire
summary: Last great pre-Islamic Persian empire, known for cultural and architectural achievements.

title: Safavid Dynasty
summary: Established Shi‘ism as state religion and led a cultural golden age.

title: Afsharid Dynasty
summary: Military-driven empire under Nader Shah, known for expansion campaigns.

rulers.name: Nader Shah
rulers.description: One of history’s greatest military strategists.

title: Zand Dynasty
summary: Era of peace and artistic growth in Shiraz under Karim Khan Zand.

rulers.name: Karim Khan Zand
rulers.description: Founder of the Zand dynasty, known for justice and prosperity.

title: Qajar Dynasty
summary: 19th-century monarchy navigating modernization and foreign influence.

title: Pahlavi Dynasty
summary: Modernization era emphasizing education and industry.

rulers.name: Reza Shah
rulers.description: Founder of the modern Iranian state.

title: Islamic Republic of Iran
summary: Theocratic-republic system formed after the 1979 Revolution.
